alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 27 at 1:47PM PST until February 27 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TUESDAY TO 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Antelope Valley. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 2 PM Tuesday to 4 AM PST Wednesday. For the Wind Advisory, until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
